name: R packages from the DESCRIPTION file (r-dependent-packages)
description: This Feature sets scripts to install dependent R packages from the DESCRIPTION file in the repository.

when.description: When to install the dependent R packages? Each option corresponds to the lifecycle scripts.

pakVersion.description: Version of pak to install. By default, the stable version is installed if needed.

manifestPath.description: The path of DESCRIPTION file recording the dependent R packages. Passed to the `root` argument of the `pak::local_install_deps()` function.

dependencyTypes.description: Comma separated list of dependency types to install. Passed to the `dependencies` argument of the `pak::local_install_deps()` function.
